questions.question: Which of the following statements would BEST support the idea that Florida has a subtropical climate?

choices.answer: Past year with 35 inches of rain
Because is located near the equator

questions.question: Summer months are more humid. Is because Warm air holds more water vapor than cold air.
Uneven heating of water in the oceans due to solar energy is ___________.
At night in beach, Air changes temperature faster than water, so the water is warmer and the air is much cooler .
Which change will an El Niño event MOST LIKELY cause?

choices.answer: colder temperatures in the southern United States
drier than usual weather in the northern United States
drier than usual weather in the southern United States
warmer than usual temperatures in the northern United States

questions.question: Empirical Evidence is information without observation and documentation of patterns.
When a warmer stream flows into a cooler lake, which of the following happens?

choices.answer: The stream water transfers heat to the lake water.
The stream water absorbs cold from the lake water.
The lake water transfers heat to the stream water.

questions.question: What process directly determines the amount of moisture in an air mass?
A model can represent an object, system, or process. Why do all models have limitations?

choices.answer: because a model includes every factor that affects it
because a model is smaller than the thing it represents
because a model is never exactly the same as the thing it represents
cold, moist air sinking in the atmosphere
narrow bands of strong winds high in the atmosphere
large air masses that flow over Earth’s surface

questions.question: Coriolis effect is cause by Earth rotation
A teacher places a metal spoon in a beaker of boiling water and then into a bowl of ice. How will heat flow?

choices.answer: Heat will flow from the frozen metal into the glass beaker.
Heat will flow from the ice cubes into the hot metal.
Heat will flow from the hot metal into the boiling water.
Heat will flow from the hot metal into the ice cubes.

questions.question: We want to know about the relation between tropical storms and El nino. Which step would the scientist is the first?

choices.answer: Observe the problem and make a hypothesis
Research to see if there is already a widely accepted explanation.
Communicate the question to as many other scientists
